allow: Bash(mkdir -p docs pages src components static)

Bash(pwsh -File .specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "Specs:
- Framework: Docusaurus 2
- Theme: Classic preset
- Sections:
  1. What is Physical AI?
  2. Humanoid Robotics Basics
  3. Sensors & Actuators
  4. Robot Control Systems
  5. Embodied Intelligence
  6. Robot Locomotion
  7. Human-Robot Interaction
  8. Robotics Safety & Ethics
- Use simple diagrams (ASCII)
- Use short explanations
- Auto-generate sidebar
- Deployment targets: Vercel + GitHub Pages" --number 1 --ShortName "docusaurus-robotics-book")
